title: TPA Orianna
body:
Hey all, I've recently noticed something about the TPA Orianna skin, it only appears in champion select, and the loading screen. So, the word "Ass" is next to Orianna's face and yes I know it is short for "Assassins", but only the word "Ass" is visible. It doesn't affect game play, but it might be a little embarrassing and could possibly make teammates or enemies call you an "Ass". This might be considered a bug, or an unintentional design. Hoping it's an easy fix!
Thanks for reading. {{champion:61}}

replies.body: Let's just assume it's an easter egg, and not mess with it.
Huh, can't believe nobody noticed that.
